Class Render

java.lang.Object
src.renderer.Render
public class Render extends Object
Render class make from the scene the color matrix

    • setMultithreading

      public Render setMultithreading(int threads)
      Chaining method for setting number of threads. If set to 1, the render won't use the thread pool. If set to greater than 1, the render will use the thread pool with the given threads. If set to 0, the thread pool will pick the number of threads.
      Parameters:
      threads - number of threads to use
      Returns:
      the current render
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when threads is less than 0

    • adaptive

      public void adaptive(int j1, int i1, int j2, int i2, int nX, int nY, int level)
      A function that improves the performance of the renderer, by dividing the grid into parts for parts with no objects, reduces the amount of rays.
      Parameters:
      nX - the number of columns in the picture
      nY - the number of rows in the picture
      level - Grid level of division

    • printGrid

      public void printGrid(int interval, Color color)
      Adds a grid to the image.
      Parameters:
      interval - num of the grid's lines
      color - the color of the grid's lines

    • writeToImage

      public void writeToImage()
      Saves the image according to image writer.
